title: Hereticks, sectaries, and schismaticks, discovered to be the Antichrist yet remaining and the great enemies of the peace of this kingdome the question rightly stated and debated ... : with a hint about ordination and the covenant.
author: Ellyson, John.
notes: Attributed to John Ellyson. Cf. Halkett and Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Imperfect: t.p. and preliminary pages partially illegible.
